question: If you no longer use the Counseling Center, why did you stop scheduling appointments? (Select all that apply)
options: Not Applicable: I currently use the Counseling Center
Use a counselor at home and/or off-campus
I no longer feel the need to utilize the Counseling Center's services
My condition improved; I will return for services in the future if needed
